name: Island Chain Outposts
culture_adjustments: Stronger Island Creole usage in daily speech
Local variants of ritual tattooing emphasizing sea-spirits
Higher tolerance for armed private crews and brokered security
Augural pilot guilds hold outsized local authority
Seasonal, itinerant population tied to trade cycles
constraints: High dependence on mainland imports (food, reagents)
notes: Serve as customs relays and augural waystations
Population fluctuates with fishing and shipping seasons
Local outposts negotiate wide autonomy with state
